entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tuktoyaktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tuktoyaktuk Airport 2:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -35.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
